K2¶

synopsis:All the goodies
mod:K2 is a package to load K2 data products into manipulable Python objects. It defines some key data structures.

DataFrame¶

The DataFrame class is designed to hold the (50,50) frame that results from an integration, along with any metadata specifically relevant to that frame.

class K2.DataFrame(time, timecorr, id, raw, flux, flux_err, flux_bkg, flux_bkg_err, cosmic_rays, quality, pos_corr1, pos_corr2, postageStamp=None)[source]¶

Container for the downlinked data.

classmethod from_row(row, postageStamp=None)[source]¶

Load a DataFrame from a FITS record array row.

class K2.PostageStamp(args)[source]¶

A container of DataFrames.

classmethod from_FITS(FITS, frames=None)[source]¶

Load a PostageStamp from a FITS file.

FITS: string of file.

TODO: Optionally select loading only a subslice of frames, so you can load say just the first 10 frames.

Examples¶

from K2 import DataFrame, PostageStamp
PS = PostageStamp.from_FITS("data/kplr060021426-2014044044430_lpd-targ.fits")
df = PS.dataFrames[0]
df.shape
